description:
Naruto goes to the hospital, when Unkai the ninja, who attacked them at the villa, appears. They search the village and come up with a theory based on the movement of Shino`s parasitic insects.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genjutsu ka Genjitsu ka, Gokan o Seisuru Mono
Genjutsu or Reality? Those Who Control the Five Senses
ความจริงหรือภาพลวงตา สิ่งที่ควบคุมสัมผัสทั้ง 5
幻術か現実か 五感を制するもの
